mapper.select:
SELECT a.course_name, a.course_sortation, a.course_credit, a.course_limit, a.course_year, a.course_semester,
b.professor_name,
c.course_code, COUNT(c.student_id) studentCount FROM course a JOIN professor b ON a.professor_id = b.professor_id JOIN my_course c ON a.course_code = c.course_code WHERE course_year = 2022 AND course_semester = 1 and a.course_code not in (select course_code from my_course where student_id = #{studentId})
AND a.depart_code = #{departCode}
GROUP BY a.course_code, a.course_name, a.course_sortation, a.course_credit, a.course_limit, a.course_year, a.course_semester,
b.professor_name,
c.course_code ORDER BY course_code ASC

SELECT a.student_id, a.student_grade, a.department_code,
b.student_name,
c.college_code, c.depart_name,
d.college_name FROM STUDENT_STUDY_INFO a JOIN STUDENT_PRI_INFO b ON a.student_id = b.student_id JOIN DEPARTMENT c ON a.department_code = c.depart_code JOIN college d ON c.college_code = d.college_code WHERE a.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT a.course_sortation, a.course_year, a.course_name, a.course_credit, a.course_semester,
b.student_id, b.course_code,
c.professor_name FROM course a JOIN my_course b ON a.course_code = b.course_code JOIN professor c ON a.professor_id = c.professor_id WHERE b.student_id = #{studentId} AND a.course_semester = '1' AND a.course_year = '2022'

SELECT a.course_sortation, a.course_year, a.course_name, a.course_credit, a.course_semester,
b.student_id, b.course_code,
c.professor_name FROM course a JOIN my_course b ON a.course_code = b.course_code JOIN professor c ON a.professor_id = c.professor_id WHERE b.student_id = #{studentId} AND b.course_code = #{courseCode} AND a.course_semester = '1' AND a.course_year = '2022'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_course ( course_reg_code, apply_date, course_code, student_id ) VALUES ( REG_SEQ.nextval, sysdate, #{courseCode}, #{studentId} )
